sentences.sContent: We’re obviously going to need more help.
sentences.sCn: 显然我们将需要更多的帮助。

sentences.sContent: Your research has obviously been very thorough.
sentences.sCn: 你的研究工作显然做得很透彻。

sentences.sContent: Obviously, this is going to take some time.
She frowned and was obviously puzzled.
sentences.sCn: 她皱起眉头，显然感到不解。

sentences.sContent: ...This obviously isn't sustainable in the long run...
...she might satisfy a curiosity that often arises in her pre-speech interviews with students who obviously have seen many science fiction movies...

words.tran: 明显的；显著的；平淡无奇的

trans.tranOther: used to mean that a fact can easily be noticed or understood
